You need a Shopify Plus Partner that can help make your ecommerce website your most powerful and effective sales tool.

Three ways we help companies like yours succeed

Better website metrics

Subpar website metrics and low conversion rates are bad for business.

 

But with better user data you can uncover barriers to purchase and design a website that outperforms your competitors.

 

You need a Shopify Plus Partner that understands the power of data and takes advantage of it in their designs.

Mobile first experiences

Let’s get into the details

What does a Shopify website cost?

 

Our average Shopify website re-build averages $75,000-$150,000. This is a one-time, fixed fee cost that includes:

  • Digital Strategy
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic + Asset Creation
  • Data Entry + Migration
  • Technical SEO Optimization
  • Analytics + Goal Setup
  • UI/UX Guidelines
  • Editors Guidelines
  • Full Ownership of Design + Development
  • Upon Completion
  • 2 Weeks Post-Launch Support

If you’re curious about what your project may cost, check out our project calculator.

What types of companies do you work with?

 

Our typical customer is a mid-market business making $25-$250m / year.

 

We most often work in the following industries:

  • Construction
  • Education
  • FinTech
  • Healthcare
  • Professional Services
  • Retail + Consumer Goods
  • SaaS

How long does it take to build a Shopify website?

 

From start to finish, our average full Shopify website re-build takes 6 months to complete.

What results should I expect?

 

Results will vary based on specific goals and your industry.

 

However, on average, our websites…

  • Are effective for 56% longer
  • Convert 82% better
  • Create a 24% lift in organic search results

Do you offer support after the Shopify website has launched?

 

Yes!

We have a dedicated support team in-house that can handle anything from routine support updates to full-feature launches for existing Shopify websites.

For The Extra Curious

What Is Shopify?

 

Shopify is a cloud-based ecommerce platform that lets businesses set up their own online stores quickly and easily. This gives them the freedom to reach out to customers in a variety of ways, such as through paid advertising, organic traffic, physical stores, and social media channels.

Everyone from retailers to independent entrepreneurs and start-ups can benefit from Shopify’s powerful tools that allow for an effortless integration with any other business systems or data sources.

What are some compelling reasons for choosing to use Shopify as an e-commerce platform for your online business?

 

Shopify is a powerful sales channel for e-commerce brands. It gives you powerful tools to automate and scale operations, making it easier to manage multiple sales channels and reach more customers.

Shopify also allows professional Shopify app development and custom app development for applications that fit the needs of a specific business or industry niche. Through these custom solutions, companies can increase their business growth and build their own custom digital experiences tailored specifically to user needs.

The advantages of using Shopify are numerous and include the following:

  • Quick and easy setup. Setting up and customizing an e-commerce store on Shopify requires no technical expertise or coding knowledge. With an intuitive user interface, you can get your store up and running quickly to start selling immediately.
  • Secure payment processing. With built-in fraud protection and secure payment gateways, customers can ensure their data is safe when purchasing from your store. Plus, no sensitive customer information is ever stored on Shopify’s servers, ensuring maximum security at all times.
  • 24/7 customer support. The dedicated team of experts at Shopify are available around the clock to help with any questions or issues you may have related to your shop. Whether troubleshooting technical issues or offering advice on marketing strategies, they are always ready to assist.
  • Mobile-friendly design. Your shop will look great no matter what device a customer views it on, as each page is optimized for mobile devices. Customers can easily find what they’re looking for while shopping from their smartphones or tablets. This convenience will lead to an increase in conversions and profitability.
  • Easy customization: With customizable themes and settings, you can easily tweak the look and feel of your shop without having to write any code yourself. This makes it easier than ever to alter the design and incorporate custom development whenever you want to keep up with trends or changes in product offerings.
  • Powerful Shopify marketing tools. To help improve your marketing campaigns, Shopify includes powerful marketing tools like email campaigns, discount codes, integration with social media platforms, analytics tracking, and more-all accessible within one unified dashboard. With powerful analytics tracking capabilities in place, e-commerce growth has never been easier!
  • Search engine optimization (SEO). Shopify offers powerful SEO capabilities to support your digital presence. Whether you’re conducting national or international e-commerce, optimizing your Shopify store for search will open new doors and opportunities to grow your Shopify operations and increase sales.
  • They abandoned the cart recovery service. If customers leave items in their shopping carts without completing checkout, Shopify will send them emails reminding them about those items-helping increase conversion rates by reducing lost sales opportunities due to forgotten items left behind in carts!
  • Performance branding. Shopify gives you endless ways to brand your e-commerce store to your target demographic so visitors will become customers.
  • Payment gateway. With its proprietary payment gateway called “Shop Pay” built into every store, merchants have access to a secure solution that enables shoppers to quickly check out without leaving their shop!

What are the various services that Shopify offers to businesses using its platform for e-commerce?

 

Shopify is a great platform for businesses that want to take their online presence to the next level. As a leading Shopify agency, we cover all the bases, from creating a digital strategy to website design and development to ongoing analysis and optimization. Our own Shopify expert and Shopify plus experts focus on creating a long-term growth plan and e-commerce strategy that is custom-tailored to the needs of your business.

If you already have an established presence on another platform, such as Drupal, and feel overwhelmed by leaping, we can handle Shopify migrations for you quickly and efficiently.

We don’t believe in a one-size-fits-all approach. That’s why we offer our custom Shopify solutions: to help you determine what your ideas and products are capable of. Our team will give you the advice, support, and strategy you need to build a successful Shopify store that shows how your customers and your brand are connected uniquely.

What aspects are involved in the design of a Shopify-based e-commerce website?

 

Shopify Design

We understand the importance of taking a holistic approach to creating Shopify web experiences.

We don’t just focus on design; we also think about important things like business goals, user experience, traffic numbers, and integrations with third-party services. Moreover, our dedicated Shopify web design professionals will work with you to create an efficient business roadmap that will meet your business goals.

Whether you’re starting up or expanding your ecommerce agency, we have the tools and expertise to design and optimize your Shopify store.

Our design portfolio features a selection of case studies, including Shopify website redesign projects, that showcase our expertise.

Shopify Theme Templates

Ecommerce websites should go beyond mere visual appeal and a colorful palette. Our user-centric design approach ensures that every detail of your theme design has been optimized for both the end user and the website owner.

Unlike some of our competitors, we don’t actually rely on any third-party themes.

We’ve developed our own custom Shopify and Shopify Plus theme, dubbed “Space Station for Shopify.” Space Station is a minimalistic base theme optimized for things like:

  • Page speed

  • Shopify sections

  • Search engine optimization

With this solid base in place, we use our Shopify website design skills to create completely custom child themes for each of our clients that take advantage of these optimizations.

Interactive Design

Our team of Shopify experts focuses on micro-interactions throughout your website to create a user interface that is easy to use and intuitive to navigate.

With our experience in Shopify web design, you can count on us to build lasting websites that are both functional and visually appealing.

Custom Development Solutions

Your Shopify store should be amazing. Our full-stack developers use the latest web technologies and web development tools to give you nothing but the best.

Third-Party Integrations

Integrating systems to keep track of customers, automate ecommerce marketing activities, and analyze data is essential for a successful online marketing strategy. This not only makes sure that everything works together, but it also helps stop data loss and security problems.

Our software engineers can work with your online marketing team to integrate third-party integrations so you can see better results from your online efforts right away.

Mobile Friendly

Companies that invest in mobile-friendly websites will reap the rewards. With great features like a streamlined checkout process, the ability to buy with just one click, and personalized messages, mobile-friendly design will improve the shopping experience for customers and get them more involved with the brand.

Our mobile-friendly website templates and design process take the unique needs of the platforms into account and create sleek, usable versions of any ecommerce store.

Implementation and Technical Support

We help businesses of different sizes, verticals, and industries find the right web development solution for their business objectives.

Whether you’re looking for custom designs, app development, or ongoing technical support and assistance, we can get you up and running quickly while ensuring that all aspects of your business operations run smoothly.

Our team of Shopify web development experts has the know-how to make your store a success.

Website Management and Maintenance

Updating a website should be easy. Whether you have an ecommerce business or a SaaS website, you’ll be able to edit your site without needing to learn programming languages. Our custom themes allow you to make content updates on the fly.

User Behavior Tracking

We use visual data tools to track user sessions on Shopify sites so we can analyze how your customers use your site and make it better for conversions.

A great user experience translates into a better marketing ROI, higher engagement from customers, and overall success for your business.

Future Planning

Over the last decade, as a top Shopify development agency, we have worked with over 100 brands. We use that experience to predict and incorporate future needs into your Shopify site.

Long-Term Support

If you’re looking for a Shopify web partner to support your website, we can definitely help. In fact, over 90% of our website redesign clients transition into long-term support clients.

Our website support team is dedicated to providing the highest level of customer service. We understand that you rely on your website functioning smoothly 100% of the time, so we are here to make sure it does!

Our website support services include fixing technical problems and making regular changes to the look and feel of your site.

  • Data and analytics

  • UX audits

  • Website maintenance

  • Landing page design

  • Conversion rate optimization

  • A/B testing

  • Multivariant testing

  • Website migration

  • Split testing

  • Page speed optimization

  • Monthly reporting

Shopify Website Store SEO Micro Audit

Boosting your visibility in search engine results is one of the best ways to grow your Shopify store and stay ahead of the competition. A Shopify website SEO micro audit identifies the weaker points in a site’s SEO performance. This is done by looking at specific aspects such as content quality, speed, or technical issues that aren’t performing as they should.

We will collect data from our insight platforms to assess the problem areas that are hurting your visitor’s ability to convert into a lead or customer. We’ll look at the user experience, the path to purchase or conversion, content effectiveness, and more.

An SEO audit will look at how shoppers interact with the company’s website, examine existing content, and identify issues that may be holding back visibility in search engine rankings.

Shopify Speed optimization

Our Shopify speed optimization Boost program is a turn-key service meant to help Shopify websites catch up.

Shopify sites can load much faster by reducing the number of requests, making files smaller, compressing images, using browser caching, and making JavaScript and CSS styling work better.

We’ll look at your current website, give you a detailed audit and success plan, and make the changes we suggest for a single, fixed price.

We help ambitious brands increase their website speed by 50% on average, resulting in lower bounce rates, better customer experiences, drive traffic and increased sales.

Shopify Website Redesign

A successful website redesign begins with a plan.

We start by evaluating your current website to identify opportunities for improvement.

We look carefully at your website’s color palette, value proposition, success stories, authority, and credibility to develop strategies that will enhance the user experience.

To reach your conversion rate optimization goals, our development experts use data analysis to track cart abandonment and bounce rates while helping optimize all other aspects of your website, from structure to visuals and content.

Shopify Plus Agency

As an award-winning Shopify Plus agency, we specialize in migrations to Shopify and Shopify Plus from other platforms, like Magento, BigCommerce, and WooCommerce.

Our Shopify experts will handle the migration of products and customer and order data, as well as third-party integrations with your CRM, ERP, IMS, and other order management systems.

If you’re just launching your product, we can assist with your Shopify or Shopify Plus store setup and advise on ecommerce business best practices. Our end goal is for you to have a seamless migration to Shopify Plus, so that your store can get up and running quickly

Shopify Plus Partner

We are a 100% certified Shopify Plus solutions partner agency. In fact, when Shopify first started the Shopify Plus partners program, we were one of the first 10 agencies to join.

If you want to upgrade to Shopify Plus, we can provide a comprehensive solution to upgrade your business’s website. We partner with brands like yours to create websites your customers will remember, vastly improve your key metrics and proudly display your brand.

Our US-based desktop and mobile developers and customer support team deliver quick, reliable support.

Shopify Plus Apps

Designed to reduce the complexity of your business so you can focus on growth, the Shopify Plus apps work seamlessly with a Shopify store.

With the Shopify Plus apps, businesses can access the necessary tools and resources they need to stay competitive while also exploring opportunities to increase their reach and customer base.

This is a great tool for any store that wants to use technology to make their business as successful as possible.

How can you outline a project plan for implementing an e-commerce website using the Shopify platform?

 

To ensure success, we take a customer-centric approach when formulating our Shopify project plans. This lets us determine what drives customers to Shopify merchants and use that information to build a strategy.

Here are a few reasons for some of the issues that our Shopify development team focuses on before launching a Shopify project:

  1. Website performance. What is the loading time of the existing website across its different pages? Can it be improved upon?
  2. Conversions. What is the conversion rate? Is there a clear plan for how the redesign will increase conversions?
  3. Site structure. Did the old website design have a clear site architecture with intuitive navigation?
  4. Color palette. Does the existing color palette serve the brand, or must it be updated?
  5. Value proposition. Does the existing layout and website copy clearly communicate the brand’s unique selling proposition, or must it be refreshed?
  6. Cart abandonment. What is the cart abandonment rate, and can it be improved upon? You want more people completing checkouts on your online store.
  7. Success stories. Does the website feature case studies prominently throughout?
  8. Bounce rates. Study user behavior in Google Analytics. If visitors bounce off your site after a few seconds, you’re probably not articulating your value proposition clearly enough. Or, you’re attracting the wrong visitors to your site.
  9. Authority and credibility. Does your existing site exude authoritativeness? Would you trust it if you were a stranger to it? You should have a plan for how the new version will improve upon marketing and sales aspects. From landing pages to product pages to your homepage, every part of your site should be aligned to strengthen your branding.

Can you provide an overview of the steps and stages involved in the web design and development process for a Shopify-based online store?

 

Our approach starts by understanding your customer, their motivations, their barriers to decision-making, and how they currently interact with your website. Together, we’ll come up with a plan for a custom Shopify site that will bring in sales.

Here are the steps we take with you to create a successful Shopify project:

  • Our team will work alongside you to discuss and establish the goals of your project followed by defining what your brand stands for.
  • Next, would be recognizing and comprehending who your target audience is and pinpointing their pain points. This helps us gain additional insight while conducting competitor analysis so you stay ahead of the game.
  • We then begin mapping out the architecture of your platform followed by specifying the features and functionalities desired.
  • The last step before bringing it all together is coding and debugging, ensuring that everything works as intended prior to launch day.

Web Design Strategy

When designing a Shopify website, it’s important to keep your target audience as interested as possible. A discovery audit of a company’s customer avatar, business goals, and other factors can help to create an engaging online store.

We make sure to fine-tune each site’s information architecture and write compelling messages that grab attention and showcase your brand’s value.

Our SEO specialists consider SEO best practices when designing your ecommerce store on the Shopify platform.

Design elements are carefully chosen to give the site a unique look and make it easy to find content. Back-end development makes sure that everything works well.

Analytics and Data

By analyzing raw data and getting feedback from customers, we can learn a lot about how your business works.

Analytics combined with customer input gives us a clear picture of our

customer’s preferences, allowing us to create a more intuitive website experience.

UX, UI Design and Website Structure

When making your site’s unique look and feel, we’ll look at your brand guidelines to make sure that all elements, such as colors, logos, graphics, and other graphic design components, are in line with your company’s message, identity, and overall style.

Website Development

Site speed, security, third-party integrations, SEO, and flexibility are paramount for mature businesses. Our designers and developers create custom solutions tailored to address these needs and more. We pair website development with a keen eye for branding and design.

What factors contribute to the recognition of a Shopify development agency as award-winning?

 

At Huemor, we strive to provide our customers with the best digital solutions for their businesses.

Our Shopify development experts are passionate about helping you create a website that is both attractive and efficient so that you can get the most out of your digital presence.

With vast experience working with clients on the world’s leading web platforms, we offer expertise to businesses of all sizes across all verticals. Whether for B2B, technology startups, or small businesses, we have a custom Shopify design and development solution for you.

What do Shopify agencies do?

 

Shopify agencies provide businesses of all sizes with a comprehensive suite of services to help get their ecommerce efforts off the ground. Shopify agencies can help with almost every part of your business, from setting up an online store and helping with design to optimizing sales processes and search engine optimization strategies. A good, experienced Shopify agency will help you use the platform’s power to make a store that is easier to use, attracts customers, and leads to sales.

Your internal marketing team or an outside digital marketing agency can work closely with a trusted Shopify agency, to make sure that your marketing efforts get the most attention and are well-coordinated. For example, a social media advertising campaign can be directed toward a custom landing page on Shopify, or SMS marketing can be integrated into your Shopify store to respond to reviews and purchases.

 

Can I hire someone to make my Shopify store?

 

We can make a Shopify store for you.

As an ecommerce agency specializing in ecommerce design and ecommerce development only, we offer custom solutions tailored to your needs. Whether you are looking for routine maintenance or a major overhaul of your store’s site design, you’re in good hands with Jorban.

From website optimization to launching an online business, we have the knowledge and skills to help you get started so that you can focus on creating amazing products and experiences for your customers.

 

What do you charge for a Shopify website?

 

Our average Shopify website redesign costs $75,000-$150,000 depending on the size and complexity of the online store. This is inclusive of a two-day strategy workshop, full UI/UX design, custom theme development, content writing, and on-site SEO. For a more accurate estimate, be sure to check out our project calculator.

If you’re not looking to redesign your entire Shopify website and would rather work on your existing website, we offer Support packages starting at $3,000/month.

 

Am I a better fit for a website redesign or conversion rate optimization?

 

Everyone has different business goals. Here’s how we typically decide which Shopify web service our clients are a better fit for:

Website redesigns are most suitable for organizations that are going through a major rebranding, want to migrate from a different platform to Shopify, or have serious issues with their current Shopify website.

Conversion rate optimization is best for organizations that have an established Shopify website they’re comfortable with and are looking to increase conversions and sales, improve the overall customer experience, grow brands, and take their digital presence to the next level.

 

Can you help me with Shopify Plus design?

 

Yes, for anything related to Shopify ecommerce, we can help. Whether you’re on Shopify or Shopify Plus, we can assist with any type of design, development, redesign, or conversion optimization. Our award winning agency has a solid track record of producing results for hundreds of clients over the course of our ten years in business.

We can also put you in touch with our large network of top-tier Shopify marketing agencies and experts who can help your brand with media buying, performance marketing, and other services. Whether you want to hire a social media manager, develop a mobile app, or focus on Google Shopping, chances are we know someone who fits the bill.

What does a 6-month conversion rate optimization engagement entail?

 

We have a 6-month roadmap to study your website traffic, observe issues or opportunities with user experience, identify quick wins, and systematically execute and measure improvements to the site.

Month 1: CRO Audit

Through a mix of user testing and data analysis, we’ll perform a CRO audit of your current website. We’ll focus on the following:

  • Priority levels
  • Problems and opportunities
  • Potential solutions
  • Issue types (design, technical, conversion, internal)
  • Bucket (quick win, test, other)

Month 2: Roadmap + Quick Wins

As a part of our web development project, our teams will collaborate by taking our findings and creating a six-month Grow roadmap. From this, you’ll have a clear understanding of where we’re going to have the biggest impact. We’ll also focus on executing the quick-win adjustments.

Months 3-6: Improvements, Testing, and Reporting

Our dedicated team of top Shopify development experts will test conversions and make improvements to your website in a way that improves web accessibility, leads to more conversions, and brings in more money. At every step of the way, they will explain the how, why, and impact.

 

What types of clients do you work with, and what’s your past experience?

 

Most of the Shopify apps and websites we create are for beauty brands, industrial or manufacturing companies, and a random mix of other industries. We provide a wide range of Shopify development and design services for our clients.

To get a better sense of who we’ve worked with, check out our client list.

 

Do you offer digital marketing services?

 

We are not a full-service digital agency, but we do offer a limited range of online marketing, social media marketing, and content marketing services, including:

  • Paid advertising (Google, Facebook, Instagram paid search)
  • Search engine optimization (including Shopify SEO and other types of ecommerce SEO)

We’re also happy to work with your existing teams to create a digital strategy that fits in with what you’re already doing and helps you reach your specific goals and business goals.

For more comprehensive help with marketing automation, performance marketing, social media and email marketing,, content management and creation, ecommerce marketing strategies, Facebook ads, influencer marketing, or lead generation, we can refer you to our network of trusted marketing agency partners who can help with your marketing campaigns.

Is it worth becoming a Shopify partner?

 

Becoming a Shopify partner can be very rewarding and helpful, especially for people in the digital and ecommerce industries. By partnering with Shopify, you get access to a wide range of tools that can help you run your business better. You will have access to a lot of resources, like tutorials and helpful guides, that will help you keep up with the latest technological changes in the industry.

Being a partner not only gives you the chance to make more money, but it also shows you how successful businesses work on different platforms. It’s a great way to gain exposure, establish yourself as an expert in your field, and make important connections, all while cultivating lasting relationships with clients.

How do I log into my Shopify partner account?

 

In order to log into your Shopify partner account, you will need to begin by navigating to the Partner portal and clicking on the Dashboard button. This will take you to the homepage, where you will be able to enter your login credentials. Enter the email address that is associated with your Shopify account, along with an appropriately secure password. After entering this information, click the Login button to use all of the great features that come with a Shopify partner account.

How do I use Shopify Partners?

 

Signing up for a Shopify Partner account is an incredibly simple process, and once you have a Partner account, you will open yourself to a world of opportunities. You can start submitting apps to the official Shopify App Store and get your unique creations out there in the market. Even better, you’ll be able to begin signing up your own clients for Shopify accounts via your Partner account. A small investment of time and effort in creating a Partner account can reap enormous benefits for any aspiring ecommerce entrepreneur.

Which are the top Shopify agencies?

 

If you’re looking for the best of the best when it comes to the best Shopify agencies here, you have a lot of great options.

The top Shopify agencies offer a wide range of services that can meet any need. They have experienced developers who specialize in making custom themes and layouts, as well as marketing experts who can help you optimize your platform for conversions. You can even find specialists who focus on specific elements such as product fulfillment, inventory management, or international shipping.

No matter what kind of expertise you’re looking for, these top-tier agencies have everything you need to grow your business.

Who are Shopify partners?

 

Shopify partners are active members of the Shopify Partner Program and use their skills and business knowledge to help clients build successful stores. They are experts in both Shopify stores and ecommerce, developing custom-designed and optimized stores that offer customers an enhanced online shopping experience.

Shopify partners make sure their clients are successful on their ecommerce platform by checking in with them regularly and giving them ongoing support and advice on ecommerce experience. As ecommerce continues to evolve, Shopify partners bring tech-savvy ecommerce solutions, knowledge, and insights to merchants all over the world.

Is Shopify a headless commerce solution?

 

Shopify does offer some headless ecommerce functionality.
